Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
BRINDALEE ESTATE, CRANBOURNE EAST - Nestled in a secluded, court like setting with expansive grassland adjacent this sensational opportunity meets all the requirements for first home buyers, investors and those looking to downsize. With its deceptively large floorplan and low maintenance nature it's sure to be an instant crowd pleaser!
The property itself features a very functional floorplan offering a vast and open lounge/dining area and an additional family zone that also incorporates the neat kitchen complete with stainless appliances including an electric oven and gas cook top.
There are 3 bedrooms including the master that has a walk-in wardrobe and its own ensuite. The remaining 2 bedrooms have easy access to the family bathroom and second toilet.
Ducted heating allows for Winter respite, whilst outside the rear yard is both private and easy to care for leaving you more time to relax and enjoy all the benefits that this established estate has to offer. Don't forget the remote single garage with additional parking space in the generous driveway.
Surrounded by established homes the property itself is only moments from all of the amenities on offer in the Hunt Club together with childcare and medical facilities, local primary/high schools and Chisholm Tafe! Not to mention the recently opened shopping development on Linsell Boulevard, only a short app. 5 minute walk away, offering Safeway, Aldi, takeaway and other various shopping outlets!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
Mayfield Estate
Located in the highly sought after Mayfield Estate is where you will find this four bedroom home with all the extras you will need! The Master bedroom is complimented by the large walk through robe with plenty of hanging space! The master also has a great sized full ensuite. The remaining three bedrooms all have double built in robes. All bedrooms have wall to wall carpets and easy to maintain Holland blinds. Boasting both formal and informal living areas you will never run out of space! Entertainers will be delighted with the fully equipped kitchen with its stainless steel appliances, Caesar stone bench tops, gas appliances and dishwasher! This property has all the modern comforts with the ducted heating and cooling, double lock up garage with remote access, under cover alfresco area and low maintenance gardens!

Description:
Plenty of space for the family
CRANBOURNE EAST - (HUNT CLUB) - Sitting on approx. 512sqm is this beautiful home, consisting of 3 large bedrooms plus study/fourth bedroom, master with full ensuite and WIR.
The property has a natural flow in the layout which offers a fantastic formal lounge flowing into a large open plan family living area and dining area. All of this is overlooked by a large spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances as well as plenty of cupboard and bench space to complete the picture.
On offer there is also a massive paved outdoor area which is perfect for entertaining family and friends all year round, as well as a fantastic landscaped backyard for the kids to play.
Other extras in the property include, ducted heating & evap cooling, fully landscaped gardens back and front, downlights and much more.
The property is located directly in front of the Cranbourne East primary & secondary schools, and minutes walk to the child care centre, parks, wetlands and public transport.
All the hard work has been done for you which makes this property a perfect place for a large family to grow.

Features include:
- 3 large bedrooms, plus study/fourth bedroom.
- 2 living areas.
- Fully Landscaped front and rear yard with a massive paved outdoor area.
- Ducted heating and evap cooling, downlights & 16 solar panels.
- Kitchen with plenty of cupboard & bench space.

Description:
House and Land Package
Buy this brand new home with all the extras included and there's no progress payments either, what an awesome package which most other builders will not offer. The features are endless and include the following:
* NO progress payments, No repayments*
* Turn Key House and Land Packages
* Huge Stamp Duty Savings
* 2 YEAR RENT GURENTEED
* Walk to St Peters Prep-12 College
* Walking distance to shops, parks!
-High ceilings "2550mm"
-900mm Freestanding Omega Upright Stainless Steel Cooker
-900mm Freestanding Omega Range hood
-Omega Stainless Steel Dishwasher
-Caesar Stone Bench top to Kitchen.
-Porcelain Vanity Basins to ensuite and Bathroom
-Mirrors to ensuite and bathroom
-Modern Tap ware used throughout, Matt Silver Finish.
-Modern Lever Door Handles, Matt Silver Finish.
-Fully tiled shower bases
-Gas instantaneous hot water system
-Gas Ducted Heating
-Kitchen Overheads with bulkhead to ceiling.
-Choice of Porcelain tiles or Laminate Floor Boards to Entry, Meals/Family Area, Kitchen and -Rear Passage. From Builders Range. Tiles to all wet areas.
-Coloured Concrete to driveway, path to front door and Alfresco Area.
-Landscaping to front and rear yards and fencing
-Fly screens to all opening windows
-Panel lift front garage door with remote control. Roller door to rear of garage where shown on plan.
-Recycled water connection to front and rear garden taps.
-New Fibre Optic communication setup through home with two phone points and two TV points.
With so many features and designs to choose from, The Bel Air Estate provides great location and convenience to schools, shops, public transport, and sporting facilities, whilst having outstanding street scape with quality built homes.
*Homes are yet to be constructed
*Photos for illustrational purposes only

Description:
Space for the whole family, a great entertainer
Are you looking for a good sized home with space for the whole family? This is the property for you and it's all located close to quality schools, parks and lakes, public transport, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Hunt Club Village Shopping Centre, has easy access to the Monash freeway and all other amenities. This amazing property proudly boasting:
- Four good sized bedrooms
- Central kitchen with plenty of bench space
- Open meals and family area
- Ducted Heating & Evaporate Cooling
- Large pergola with Built in Bar & Barbeque
- Approx. 506m2 block of land
- Double garage with rear rollerdoor
- Good sized backyard above ground swimming pool.
- Plus much more...
All this and much more, make this the perfect entertainer's dream, ready for you to move in and enjoy. The quiet position makes this the perfect place to call home. For more information on this outstanding property, Call Paul.
Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our Business Development Officer Jami Mcdonald has appraised this property at $430-$440 p/w ($1,868 - $1,911 pcm) for more details about leasing contact Jami on 03 9705 3000 today.

Description:
A HIDDEN GEM
CRANBOURNE EAST: Tucked away in a quiet street yet moments away from all the action, this lovely 3 bedroom home situated in the Avenues Estate is any buyer's delight. The formal lounge is a perfect place to relax and the spacious kitchen with an island bench and a formal meals area offers plenty of space for a large family. The master bedroom comes with a full ensuite and WIR and the other 2 bedrooms are of a generous size perfect for even the biggest kids! The home has added extras including dishwasher, ducted heating throughout the house and the double garage that has both internal and rear access.
You will continue to be impressed at the outside of the house by the alfresco, which overlooks the private and manicured low maintenance rear garden. To complete the package there is a colorbond workshop offers extra storage and the extra wide frontage has access to the rear yard through double gates which is excellent to park your trailer or your boat. This is what we call home!
With close proximity to amenities that is evident with an excellent Walk score. An approximate 7 mins walk to the Cranbourne Library and a 8 mins walk to the Casey Race and the Cranbourne Primary School.
Cranbourne East is located on the outskirts of Cranbourne Central. The area offers Cranbourne East Primary and Cranbourne East Secondary College as well as Cranbourne Secondary College and is surrounded by multiple Shopping Centres. Also located nearby is the newly constructed Casey Fields football ground, Casey Race Recreation & Aquatic Centre, and Casey Library.
***PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS***

Description:
Looking for a super display home?
Located in the sought after Livingston Estate is this gorgeous EX-DISPLAY property also known as the WAIKIKI by AMAROO HOMES, this Prestige home is certain to surpass all expectations.
The home begins with a huge door that leads to a large hall way that's sure to impress upon entry. The floor plan then begins with a study, followed by a large master bedroom, WIR and an open ensuite that contains double vanities and an oversized shower.
The home also has more living space than just your average, beginning with a fully enclosed theatre room, a huge family living and dining area that opens onto an undercover alfresco with BI-fold doors and there's also a separate kids retreat at the back of the property.
But if that doesn't impress you, then the kitchen in this home most certainly will, with 40mm waterfall stone benches, 900mm oven, dishwasher, mirror splashback, a skylight and a complete butler's pantry to complete the picture. With a kitchen like this, you couldn't ask for more.
Some of the extras in this home include:
- Kitchen with waterfall benches, mirror splashback, butler's pantry & skylight
- 4 large bedrooms, master with full ensuite and WIR
- High celling's, LED downlights, ducted heating and evaporative cooling
- 3 separate living areas including enclosed theatre room
- Outdoor alfresco
The location will ensure interest, positioned within short distance to
Schools & and major shopping centers, across the road from Casey Race & with ease of access to all the major arterials. This one must be on your list!

Description:
PRIME LOCATION IN THE HUNT CLUB!
Cranbourne East: If you have been looking for a home where you can simply move in, unpack and relax then dont pass up an inspection. Located in the highly sort after Hunt Club Estate, ideally suited to those requiring multiple living zones this home is a fine example of family living at its finest.
The open floor plan itself offers four spacious robed bedrooms, the master complete with walk in robes and a full ensuite.
Your kitchen which overlooks the rear living zone and outdoor entertaining area comes fitted with stainless steel appliances, tiled splash back, 4 burner gas cook top not to mention ample amounts of bench and overhead storage space all this plus much more!
Added features include: ducted heating & split system cooling, internal access, landscaped rear and front yard, rear access with plenty of space for additional cars, convenient blend of carpet and tiles with neutral tones throughout.
If you love to entertain then youll be able to appreciate the appeal of the quality built alfresco, this would be the perfect place to entertain friends and family of all sizes. The backyard has a generous mix of grass and sheltered space, which creates a nice mix for both adults and kids to enjoy.
Step outside and be taken back by the amazing street appeal this home has on offer, with landscaped gardens and a widened paved driveway to your double car garage, this home is immaculate from back to front.
This is a tremendous opportunity for a family who insists on nothing but the best!
Minutes away from Free way access en route to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre, not to mention walking distance from the Hunt club primary and secondary school, Selandra rise shopping centre and hunt club village!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Description:
Exceptional Living In Cascades On Clyde
A seemingly modest abode from the exterior opens to a world of pure elegance, luxury and style by the wonderful master builders, Fairhaven Homes. This home is of the highest quality and standards with neutral colours that flow throughout and adds a welcoming warmth from the moment you arrive! Located in the popular Cascade on Clyde Estate close to all amenities and leading schools in the Casey region. This fabulous 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom, plus spacious study is the ideal family home. An exceptional kitchen fitted with Delonghi appliances, built in coffee machine and conventional microwave is complete with stone bench tops and makes for an entertainers delight! The outdoor alfresco area wired for sound, with a built in stainless steel BBQ and stone bench tops, plumbed to natural gas, plus a gas log fire, overlooks the beautiful solar heated pool and is a wonderful setting for entertaining with family and friends throughout all seasons. To add to the entertainment factor this home offers a luxurious cinema room and Big Picture fit out. With so many extra’s: 9m X 6.5m garage, 3 phase refrigerated cooling, solar panels with 5KLW invertor, rear shed… the list is endless and requires an inspection to appreciate the true value this home has to offer and so much more that you will discover at the viewing. Be sure not to miss it or you will be disappointed!

Description:
Secure Your Very Own Piece Of The Hunt Club!
Imagine waking up every morning in a place of harmony and being greeted when you arrive home to a place of sophistication and style. You will be amazed and impressed with the clever floor plan of this home. Offering a wide entrance hall, 3 good sized bedrooms, master bedroom with full en suite and walk in robe. The tiled entry flows past the formal lounge and leads to the open plan family and meals area overlooked by the fantastic kitchen with stainless appliances. Outdoors is a generous tranquil backyard that will allow you to relax and unwind. Standard inclusions include heating and cooling, double remote garage with internal access and quality window coverings. The Owners will remain for approx. 12 months and pay you $380.00 per week - Making this a sound investment.

Description:
Perfection In The Hunt Club!
Located in the highly sought after Hunt Club with commanding street appeal, is this impressive home with premium fixtures and fittings throughout. The magnificent 4 bedroom plus study residence is modern and luxurious. This quality home features wide entrance way, formal lounge at the front of the home, open plan second living area with kitchen overlooking meals area. The kitchen itself offers stainless steel appliances and abundance of bench and cupboard space. The master bedroom is at the rear of the home and features with walk in robe & double showered en suite, all other bedrooms are large and with built in robes.
Additional features include DLUG with remote and internal access, corner block position allowing you to park your boat or caravan to rear of the yard on the large allotment of 621m2 (approx). Central ducted heating throughout & 5 KW solar panels, neutral modern tones throughout, walking distance to local schools, shops and much more!
Contact Waseem Asif or Leon D'Penha to inspect today!

Description:
Wow I want this one Darling!
Quality, style and modern finishing's are showcased in this immaculate 4 bedroom home located in the sought after Mayfield Estate.
Featuring quality tiles throughout, four generous- sized bedrooms, spacious master bedroom with walk-in-robe and full ensuite. Remaining 3 bedrooms all with built in robes and serviced by a sleek central family bathroom and separate toilet. Two separate living zones including formal lounge plus family room and meals area. Great Size kitchen with over sized island bench, creaser stone bench tops, quality stainless steel appliances and pantry.
Sliding doors open outside to the extensive undercover alfresco and entertaining area, private rear yard complete with low-maintenance gardens.
Extra features include:
- Double garage with internal access
- Ducted heating
This home takes full advantage of its surroundings, including the stunning 3 hectare natural woodland entry preserving and enhancing historic Flora with elevated views across Casey Fields to the nearby Dandenong Ranges and boast convenience being within close proximity to everyday amenities.
Don't miss this golden lifestyle opportunity!

Description:
Great Location - 495sqm - Last block left in Livingston!
Located on 495sqm on a corner block with dual access this is the last available block in Livingston & in the perfect spot where the Sales & Information Centre was once located! Just around the corner from the Megasaurus Park and child care facilities, the block has access to 10 hectares of park lands, sporting ovals and walking tracks & is situated a short walk to the Casey Race Aquatic Centre and Health and Wellness Centre. You are also an easy walk to Casey Fields Sports Complex & there are proposed plans in place for Livingston Primary school, Kindergarten and Child Health Centre.
Be part of the growing community of Livingston: "Family life as it should be" - call now for more information & grab this one before it's too late.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
Corner Position - Four Bedrooms
A perfect consideration for the growing family or investors this modern 4 bedroom property in the Hunt Club is located within easy walking distance to reserves, secondary colleges and with Casey Fields also close by, this property will no doubt attract high interest and is priced to sell! Includes extensive floor tiling from the entry through to the well equipped chefs quarters with Stainless appliances and features a separate formal lounge, open plan meals area and spacious family room with access to a covered alfresco area overlooking a generous enclosed rear yard. Creature comforts include ducted central heating, split system reverse cycle air conditioning and double remote garage with direct internal home access. Well located and very well priced, this is an opportunity not to be missed! Call Jess now for further details.

Description:
FAMILY LIVING IN THE HUNT CLUB
CRANBOURNE EAST: If you are looking for the perfect family home then look no further than this beautifully presented four-bedroom home in the highly sort after Hunt Club Estate.
A wonderfully versatile floor plan arrangement is introduced by the separate sitting area which flows through to the relaxed family domain. The contemporary kitchen which overlooks the dining and family area consists of Caesar stone bench tops and high-end appliances. Those needing additional space will be greatly pleased with the separate yet adjoining rumpus room.
Flowing out from the main living zone is the alfresco area which is ideal for entertaining family and friends all while watching the kids play in the back yard.
Separated by a rear hallway are three bedrooms which are all generous in proportion with double door robes. The master suite is set apart at the front of the home which offers added privacy. Featuring en suite with spa and double vanities, a large walk in robe and its own separate study room.
The Hunt Club is a multi-award-winning estate offering numerous parks, Hunt Club Wetlands, walking and bicycle paths as well as a complete range of childcare, primary (Cranbourne East Primary) and secondary schools (Cranbourne East Secondary College). Recycled water, high speed broadband and environmentally friendly designs are all part of the estate.
Added internal and external features include;
* Approximately 32 sq under roof line
* Approximately 572 sqm land
* Three separate living areas
* Four bedrooms plus study
* Master with full en suite and walk in robe
* Spa bath in en suite
* Ducted Heating
* Evaporative cooling
* 900 mm oven and gas cook top
* Caesar stone benches
* Ducted Vacuum
* Solar hot water
* Internal access from garage
* Alfresco
* Main gas fitted in Alfresco
* Down lights
* Shed
* Archers Field bus stop is approximately three minutes walk away from the house
* Cranbourne East Primary School is approximately eight minutes walk away from the house
* Cranbourne East Secondary School is approximately nine minutes walk away from the house
* The Casey Complex is approximately four minutes drive away from the house
* Cranbourne Park shopping centre is approximately seven minutes drive away from the house
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
CRANBOURNE EAST: **3 BEDROOMS PLUS BONUS STUDY/RETREAT** Almost new, ready to enjoy and set in a blossoming pocket of Cranbourne East, this home will entice home buyers and investors alike with one simple question why bother building? You can have it all right here in a property that has been well finished and designed with a low maintenance lifestyle in mind!
Step inside and be greeted by 2 separate living zones - there's a generous formal lounge plus an open plan family/meals zone which incorporates the stone topped kitchen complete with stainless appliances. Don't forget the separate children's retreat positioned at the rear of the floorplan that can double up as a home office or be easily converted into a bonus 4th bedroom!
There are 3 current robed bedrooms including the master with a walk-in wardrobe and a full ensuite to complement the family bathroom. Ducted heating and split system air-conditioning ensure year round comfort, whilst outside you will find a double garage with remote roller door, a decked alfresco plus a secure backyard with maintenance free artificial grass!
Nestled amongst the thriving Selandra Rise and Pasadena estates, both uniquely planned communities catering to your every need, and surrounded by facilities including parkland and public transport making it ideal for a growing family! Only a short drive to freeway access and all of the amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. This sensational opportunity is also only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground and the aquatic centre!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Address: 29 Stone Hill Circuit Cranbourne East VIC 3977
Description:
Impressive Family Proportions & Premium Lifestyle
Sold in 24 hours for a record price of $900,000 by Alex Iegazarov!
Cranbourne East (Hunt Club): Tucked away at the end of a blissfully quiet and revered blue chip address, this impressive residence is a stroke of architectural genius that optimises resort inspired living, with its open-plan design, luxury appointments, and massive alfresco with electric roller shutters next to the heated family sized pool.
The vast and versatile interior offers a grand double door entry, a massive formal living zone with lounge and dining, an open plan kitchen/meals and a living space. The modern kitchen showcasing stone benches, stainless steel appliances, flows on to a relaxed family living room.
Upstairs 4 double bedrooms, main bathroom and another living room
Out the back you will find a massive size alfresco with outdoor built in BBQ, low maintenance gardens, water tanks and in ground solar heated swimming pool.
Not to mention rear access through the garage to the 4 car workshop in the back yard.
Extras include: 3 phase power, 12 commercial solar panels, refrigerated cooling, evaporative cooling, split system air-conditioners and ducted heating.
This massive house is:
Living area: 39 squares approx.
2 X Double garage
Alfresco
4 car workshop
Total: 60squares approx.
Built 2005
Land approx. 768 m2
This resort style residence is a must see for any family looking to upsize or wanting a more luxurious lifestyle. You will be the envy of all your friends and family as all the hard work has been completed, you just need to move straight in.
